entry.title: Sunday: Drizzle. High plus 4 except 8 inland.
entry.summary: Drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast near noon. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 4 except 8 inland. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
